name: Stickman shoot!
description:
Stickman shoot is my latest project, I'm looking forward on this game and will get updates. Press E turn, SPACE to shoot.   A and D are the new buttons to shoot.

On latest update, 1.0.4 I overall redesigned some aspects, I will probably have redesigned everything on next update to look more beautiful and pixelate
Another thing added was kill score and coin score and a better end game screen.
